courses.description: A foundational course covering the basics of biology, including cell structure, genetics, and evolution.
An in-depth study of organic compounds, their structures, properties, and reactions.
A comprehensive overview of major events and themes in world history from ancient times to the present.

admission_process.description: Fill out the online application form and pay the application fee.
Submit official transcripts, standardized test scores, and letters of recommendation.
Participate in a personal interview with the admissions team.

teacher_profiles.description: Professor of Biology with a focus on molecular biology and genetics.
Professor of Chemistry specializing in organic synthesis and chemical biology.
Professor of History with research interests in medieval and early modern history.

alumni_info.description: Graduated in 2011 with a degree in Biology. Currently a research scientist at a biotech company.
Graduated in 2013 with a degree in Chemistry. Now a pharmaceutical chemist at a major drug company.
Graduated in 2016 with a degree in History. Working as a historian and author.

career_paths.description: Graduates can work in biotechnology firms, focusing on research and development of new products.
Opportunities in the pharmaceutical industry involve drug development and quality control.
Graduates can engage in historical research, writing, and teaching at various institutions.

employers.description: A leading biotechnology company known for its innovative research and product development.
A major pharmaceutical company specializing in drug discovery and development.
A renowned research institution focusing on historical studies and publications.
